dct_title_s: Hierosolyma vrbs sancta, Iudeae, totivs qve orientis longe clarissima, qva amplitudine ac magnificentia hoc nostro Ã¦vo conspicva
dct_alternative_sm: Hierosolyma urbs sancta, Judeae, totius que orientis longe clarissima, qua amplitudine ac magnificentia hoc nostro aeuo conspicua est
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, settlements, places of historical interest.
Features illustration of men at bottom of map.
Descriptive text at top of map: Ezechielis. V. Haec est Ierusalem, ego eam in medio gentium posui, et in eius circuitu terras.
Appears in Braun and Hogenber's Civitates orbis terrarum, Cologne, 1575.
